name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh Atlantic salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with steamed vegetables and a lemon butter sauce.

name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty topped with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles, served on a toasted brioche bun with fries.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, parmesan cheese, and croutons, with an option to add grilled chicken.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce, baked in a wood-fired oven.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Traditional Italian pasta dish with a creamy sauce made of eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: A mix of seasonal vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce, garlic, and ginger, served with jasmine rice.
